MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG11 postcode area of Lockerbie. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:30pm to safely restore the network after completing repairs on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:46pm on Thursday, 14 January 2021
